Chat frequently with %s ?" Why not invite %s to use iSMS to save both of your money?"

To send an invitation, your composing messages will be discarded.
Hi, iSMS is a cool chatting tool. It is free and convenient. Please check http://isms.hissage.com to find more.
Messages marked as Spam will move to Spam list and be turned off the notification automatically.
iSMS service is not avaliable in this selected SIM card. This message can only be sent via MMS in this SIM card. Continue anyway?
iSMS service is not avaliable in this selected SIM card. This message can only be sent via SMS in this SIM card. Continue anyway?
The recipient(s) is(are) not iSMS user. This message can only be sent via MMS. Continue anyway?
The recipient(s) is(are) not iSMS user. This message can only be sent via SMS. Continue anyway?
iSMS service is avaliable in this selected SIM card. To save SMS rate, it is suggested switch the message to iSMS. Switch now?
iSMS service is avaliable in this selected SIM card. To save MMS rate, it is suggested switch the message to iSMS. Switch now?
Include email address in contact resultes
Save In SD card in zip format
E-Mail chat history in zip format
Set a ringtone for new notifications
Save this chat thread to SD card as a zip file
Share this chat thread as attachment via E-Mail in zip format
All chat history will be cleared in this chat room

"You don't have any spam conversation. SPAM collects all conversations that are marked as spam. Notification will be turned off by default. This avoid you from unnecessary disturbance.
You can mark a sender as spam by holding a conversation and selecting Mark as Spam icon. When a conversation is marked as spam, a notification-off icon will be shown automatically and the conversation will be placed here."
This is an example of spam message.

"You don't have any group chat message. GROUP CHATS collects all group chat messages that are created or joined by you. This allows you find and manage your group chats easily.
To create a group chat, you can tap on Create a group chat button at the bottom of this screen and invite your friends to join the group."
"Your friend: I like group chat feature!"

"You don't have any important message. IMPORTANT collects all the messages that are flagged as important. This allows you find important messages easily.
You can flag a message as important by holding a message and selecting Flag as important from Option menu. When a message is flagged as important, you will see a red flag icon as below."
This is an example of a message flagged as important. A red flag will appear.
"To use this feature. you will have to activate iSMS service first. Don't worry - if you don't like the service, you can always turn off in Settings. Try it out now!"
With iSMS, you can instantly deliver free messages, and keeps your chat history in one place, Press on one button, comes the new experience!

"iSMS service alows you chat and share multimedia files with you friends at any time at any place through WIFI or data conection.
Only 3 step to complete the activation!
Terms and Condition "

"This feature is only supported by iSMS service.
iSMS service allows you chat and share multimedia with your friends at any time at any place through WIFI or data connection.
Terms and Condition"
This feature is only supported by iSMS service. Activate your iSMS account now?
This feature is only supported by iSMS service. Enable your iSMS account now?
The current SIM does not support iSMS. Switch to other SIM?
